#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<cmath>
#define intin(a)    scanf("%d",&a)
#define scans(a)    scanf("%s",a)
#define LL long long
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int cases,r,c;
    intin(cases);
    while(cases--)
    {   intin(r);intin(c);
        if(!r || !c)  {cout<<"0\n";continue;}
        if(r&1) r=r-(r/2+1);
        else    r=r-r/2;

        if(c&1) c=c-(c/2+1);
        else    c=c-c/2;
        cout<<1+r+c<<"\n";
    }
}
